data.title: Generated by Personal Ancestral File
data.text:
Descendants of Elisha Durham

Fifth Generation

(Continued)

295. Anne Rigg (Catherine Durham , Elijah , Elijah , Elisha ) was born on 27 Apr 1927 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. She died on 10 Sep 1998 in Corsica Hills Nursing Center, Centreville, Maryland. She was buried in Westminster Cemetery, Maryland.

Anne married Charles B. Dreibelbis Sr. in 1946. Charles was born on 27 Nov 1921. He died on 8 Jun 1991.

They had the following children:

642 M i Charles B. Dreibelbis Jr. 643 M ii Dale W. Dreibelbis 644 F iii Anne C. Dreibelbis 645 F iv Gayle E. Dreibelbis

298. Harold Francis Durham (David Livid , John Wesley , John , Elisha ) was born on 14 Aug 1913 in Elwood, Madison, Indiana. He died on 15 Jul 1990 in St. Johns Medical Center, Anderson, Madison, Indiana. He was buried on 18 Jul 1990 in St. Joseph Cemeter, Elwood, Indiana.

Harold married Lois Viola Ferguson daughter of Clarence Henry Ferguson and Minnie Jane Ike.

They had the following children:

+ 646 M i Frank Alvin Durham

300. Lawrence Everling (Rebecca Harriet Moore , Amanda Alice Durham , John , Elisha )

He had the following children:

+ 647 F i Everling

302. Elizabeth Mae Durham "Betty" (Walter Elias , Robert John , Elizabeth , Elisha ) was born on 28 Mar 1902 in Concordville, Pennsylania. She died on 16 Jan 1978 in Lankenau Hospital, Montgomery County, Pennsylvania. She was buried on 20 Jan 1978 in Rolling Green Cemetery, West Chester, Pennsylvania.

Elizabeth married Earl Percy Blair son of Robert Blair and Josephine. Earl was born on 30 May 1865 in Maryland. He died in Sep 1968 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

They had the following children:

+ 648 M i Nelson Earl Blair 649 F ii Rose Blair Rose married Spivey. 650 F iii Flora J. Blair Flora married Wallace Spivey son of McClarin Spivey and Mary Harris.

303. Robert Elisha Durham (Walter Elias , Robert John , Elizabeth , Elisha ) was born on 5 Apr 1904 in Moylan, Delaware, Pennsylvania. He died on 25 Dec 1980 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He was buried in Northwood Cemetary, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

Robert married (1) Delaphine W. Byard daughter of James H. Byard and Flora H. Drain.

Robert married (2) Lishia Ann Kelly daughter of George W. Kelly and Frances Selby on 14 Jan 1945 in Wilmington, New Castle, Delaware. Lishia was born on 22 Dec 1910 in Accomack, Virginia. She died on 4 May 1989. She was buried in Northwood Cemetary, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

They had the following children:

+ 651 F i Lishia Marcella Durham 652 F ii Barbara Eleanor Durham died in Mar 2012. Barbara married Haskins.

304. Helen Mildred Durham (Walter Elias , Robert John , Elizabeth , Elisha ) was born on 11 Oct 1905. She died on 13 Mar 1972. She was buried in Mount Lawn Cemetery, Delaware County, Pennsylvania.

Helen married (1) Harry Bowles. Harry was buried in Ivy Hill Cemetery, Wyncote, Pennsylvania.

They had the following children:

653 M i Edgar Bowles

Helen married (2) Waldorf E. Stith.

Helen married (3) Enos Pierce Jr. son of Enos Pierce Sr. and Catherine Durham. Enos was born in 1905. He died in 1948. He was buried in Gouldtown Memorial Park, Cumberland, New Jersey.

They had the following children:

+ 654 F ii Pierce + 655 M iii Enos Walter Pierce + 656 M iv Alfred Horace Pierce Sr.

Helen married (4) Enos Pierce Jr. son of Enos Pierce Sr. and Catherine Durham. Enos was born in 1906 in Salem, New Jersey. He died on 15 Dec 1948. He was buried in Gouldtown Memorial Park, Fairfield Township, Cumberland, New Jersey.

They had the following children:

+ 657 M v Enos Walter Pierce is printed as #655. + 658 M vi Alfred Horace Pierce Sr. is printed as #656.

306. Wilbur Casper Durham (Walter Elias , Robert John , Elizabeth , Elisha ) was born on 19 Nov 1910. He died on 7 Nov 1988. He was buried in Immanuel Union United Methodist (Manship) Cemetery, Bishop's Corner, Kent, Delaware.

Wilbur married Martha Louise Webb daughter of James L. Webb Rev. and Cora E. Hubbard. Martha was born on 10 Nov 1910 in Preston, Maryland. She died on 27 Oct 1999 in Annapolis, Anne Arundel, Maryland. She was buried on 30 Oct 1999 in Immanuel Union United Methodist Church (Manship) Cemetery, Bishop's Corner, Kent, Delaware.

They had the following children:

659 F i Lucretia Cora Durham Lucretia married T. H. Burns Rev..

307. Howell Calvin Durham Sr. (Walter Elias , Robert John , Elizabeth , Elisha ) was born on 6 Jan 1914 in Moylan, Pennsylvania. He died on 5 Jan 1993 in Main Line Nursing and Rehabilitation Center, Paoli, Pennsylvania.

He had the following children:

660 M i Howell Calvin Durham Jr. 661 M ii Marshall Durham 662 M iii Robert Durham 663 F iv Shirley Durham Shirley married Porter. 664 F v Rose Durham

310. Raymond Greenage ~ (Eveline May Durham , Robert John , Elizabeth , Elisha ) was born on 19 Oct 1900 in Pennsylvania. He died on 7 Jul 1979.

Raymond married (1) Della Patton.

They had the following children:

665 F i Barbara Greenage ~ 666 F ii Anna Greenage ~

Raymond married (2) Jennie Knox daughter of Knox about 1936 in Detroit, Wayne, Michigan. Jennie was born on 24 Nov 1904 in Hopkinsville, Kentucky. She died on 30 Mar 1967 in Detroit, Wayne, Michigan. She was buried on 4 Apr 1967 in Detroit Memorial Park Cemetery, Detroit, Michigan.

311. Dorothy Greenage ~ (Eveline May Durham , Robert John , Elizabeth , Elisha ) was born on 1 Sep 1902 in Media, Pennsylvania. She died on 27 Jun 1997 in Charter House Convalescent Center of Farmington Hills, Michigan. She was buried on 8 Jul 1997 in Rolling Green Memorial Park, West Chester, Pennsylvania.

Dorothy married (1) Raymond Thompson son of Alexander Thompson and Ella. Raymond was born about Mar 1899 in Delaware. He died in 1944 in Pennsylvania.

They had the following children:

667 F i Rita Lee Thompson Rita married John E. Drew. + 668 M ii Raymond Thompson

Dorothy married (2) William Oscar Downs in 1953. William was born on 28 Nov 1892 in Caroline County, Maryland. He died in Sep 1969 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

313. Anna Vencenia Greenage ~ (Eveline May Durham , Robert John , Elizabeth , Elisha ) was born on 6 Sep 1906 in Cheswold, Kent, Delaware. She died on 9 Jun 1996 in Royal Oak, Oakland, Michigan.

Anna married (1) William Brogg about 1921 in Wilmington, New Castle, Delaware. William was born about 1903 in Petersburg, Virginia. He died in (no record).

They had the following children:

+ 669 M i Homer Brogg Greenage ~

Anna married (2) Drayton Williams about 1928 in Detroit, Wayne, Michigan. Drayton was born about 1903 in Michigan.

Anna married (3) William Marlone before 1937 in Detroit, Wayne, Michigan. William died in (no record).

They had the following children:

+ 670 F ii Marlene Phyillis Marlone

Anna married (4) Claude John Wesley. Claude was born on 10 Sep 1908. He died on 30 Apr 1993 in Detroit, Wayne, Michigan.

316. Naomi Ruth Greenage ~ (Eveline May Durham , Robert John , Elizabeth , Elisha ) was born on 2 Jul 1912 in Dover, Kent, Delaware. She died on 3 Jul 1987 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. She was buried in Fernwood Cemetery.

Naomi married (1) Booker T. Davis.

They had the following children:

671 F i Joan E. Davis was born in 1931. She died in 1955. She was buried in Immanuel Union United Methodist Church (Manship) Cemetery, Bishop's Corner, Kent, Delaware. 672 F ii Zenobia Davis was born on 16 Dec 1932 in Detroit, Wayne, Michigan. She died on 11 Sep 1996.

Naomi married (2) Herbert Pressley.
